80.title: App Health
80.description: Overall health indicator for your App based on European Football using the six icons to the immediate right. If all are green, then App Health is green. If any icon is red, then App Health is red. If all icons are green and just one is yellow, then App Health is yellow. And just like Football, two yellow cards (icons) equal a red card (icon).

81.description: Rate of sessions that converted with good user experience.
